title: Chandra Levy: An American Murder Mystery
overview: On May 1, 2001, 24-year-old Chandra Levy left her Washington, D.C., apartment and vanished without a trace. Police feverishly scoured the city for clues about the missing Capitol Hill intern's whereabouts, but a powerful man hampered their search â€“ Chandra's alleged lover, U.S. Congressman Gary Condit. Now, TLC and Investigation Discovery (ID) delve into the sex, lies and scandal behind one of our nation's most salacious crimes with the premiere of Chandra Levy: An American Murder Mystery. The latest installment of the hit American Murder Mystery franchise explores the seedy underbelly of the D.C. elite that was exposed during the harrowing search for justice.
